channel.title: Runix-World - Rise above others!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ri5kr7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/jsj0ux.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://runix-world.com"]Homepage[/URL] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/mcw7qc.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://runix-world.com/forum"]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1z2p2tt.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://runix-world.com/webclient.html"]Play Now![/URL] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/6rox14.gif[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.google.com/toplist/details-15361-Runix_World.html"]Vote Now![/URL] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/r0tswp.gif[/img] [URL=http://"http://runix-world.com/highscores/"]Highscores[/URL]
[size=12pt][font=Verdana]Runix-World Developers[/font][/size] - Oledis (Main Server Developer) - Eeru1 (Second Server Developer/Website Developer) - Mr PeeHat (Forum Developer) - N33b (Co-Owner)
[size=12pt][font=Verdana]Runix-World Features[/font][/size]
- Runix-World is Hosted 24/7 - Active Developer(s) - Active Administrator(s) - Stable coded Source - 508 Maps - HighScores - Vote4Cash - AutoDonations - NPC face orientation - Working Hunter - Working FireMaking - Working Agility - Fixed NoClipping - Veteran/Max/Completionist cape - Completionist cape & Veteran cape Emotes - Nex - Bosses - Flawless Combat
Alot more
[size=12pt][font=Verdana]Runix-World Images[/font][/size]
Webclient: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/280l5qv.png[/img]
Login screen: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2zp1282.png[/img]
Starter Package: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/264g878.png[/img]
Shops: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/160r7k3.jpg[/img]
Teleports: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ajoq6f.jpg[/img]
Maps: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ihx9pe.png[/img]
Clan Chat: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/b548s2.png[/img]
Fire Making: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/b6t2e0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ng5wnb.png[/img]
Armadyl Godsword Special: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2rh45k1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/fwufwm.png[/img]
[size=12pt][font=Verdana]Runix-Why should you join Runix-World[/font][/size]
Runix-World is a Private server which guarantee you activity. Our developers are active and try their best to improve the server where you want. We listen to our members and update whatever you prefer. We hope to see you very soon at Runix-World!
[/CENTER]

item.title: Runix-World - Rise above others!
item.dc:creator: @Jamix Jamix
item.description:
@Jamix wrote:

Thanks for the Feedback people!

'Remind* We strive to listen to our members, Feedback is always welcome.
We have a Professional coder which can do almost everything to make the server like you want!

ri5kr7.png1024×126

Read full topic

item.title: Runix-World - Rise above others!

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Decent advertisement, like the logo especially.

Don’t really see anything appealing though

Looks like a decent server.

item.title: Runix-World - Rise above others!
item.dc:creator: @pengu pengu
item.description:
@pengu wrote:

Nothing new… Just those interfaces, that’s about it. Of course I’m very new to developing rsps’s, So i shouldn’t be talking. >.<

Read full topic

item.title: Runix-World - Rise above others!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I like the webclient page, log-in interface, spacing of the items in the shops, however, the rest of them isn’t that great, I see nothing new besides those three things I stated before.

Read full topic
